original_text: And Solomon went up there to the bronze altar before the Lord, which was at the tent of meeting, and offered a thousand burnt offerings on it.
korean_text: 여호와 앞 곧 회막 앞에 있는 놋 제단에 솔로몬이 이르러 그 위에 천 마리 희생으로 번제를 드렸더라

sentences.original_text: to the bronze altar before the Lord
which was at the tent of meeting
and offered a thousand burnt offerings on it
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 위에 번제 천 마리를 드렸습니다
